com.intuit.wasabi.authentication

Interface Authentication

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultAuthentication

    public interface Authentication
    Classes implementing this interface allow for login, logout, user lookup and basic session handling.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      UserInfo getUserExists(String userEmail)
      Looks up if a user with the specified email exists.
      LoginToken logIn(String authHeader)
      Attempts to login the user identified via the specified authHeader.
      boolean logOut(String tokenHeader)
      Attempts to logOut the user using the retrieved token.
      LoginToken verifyToken(String tokenHeader)
      Attempts to verify the user token retrieved via the specified tokenHeader.

    • Method Detail

      • logIn

        LoginToken logIn(String authHeader)
        Attempts to login the user identified via the specified authHeader.
        Parameters:
        authHeader - the authentication header
        Returns:
        a login token for this user on success
        Throws:
        AuthenticationException - if not successful

      • verifyToken

        LoginToken verifyToken(String tokenHeader)
        Attempts to verify the user token retrieved via the specified tokenHeader.
        Parameters:
        tokenHeader - the token header
        Returns:
        a login token for this user on success
        Throws:
        AuthenticationException - if not successful

      • logOut

        boolean logOut(String tokenHeader)
        Attempts to logOut the user using the retrieved token.
        Parameters:
        tokenHeader - the token header
        Returns:
        true on success, false otherwise
        Throws:
        AuthenticationException - if the logout failed

      • getUserExists

        UserInfo getUserExists(String userEmail)
        Looks up if a user with the specified email exists.
        Parameters:
        userEmail - the user mail
        Returns:
        the UserInfo of the particular user
        Throws:
        AuthenticationException - if it not possible to retrieve the user info
